metadata.title: CVE-2023-4764 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in BFCache in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.179allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar)via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
